about_the_game:
Urban Genesis is a Story-driven VR sandbox game, combining elements of the lego/sandbox genres. Build your world, big or small, then fill it with any of over thousands of objects. Add characters whose joints can be pushed, pulled and twisted into any pose imaginable, then customize your character however you desire. The only limit is your imagination!


Build your world: Create environments big or small, and fill them with over a thousand objects.

Add characters: Customize characters by pushing, pulling, and twisting their joints into any pose imaginable.

Give them a voice: Use custom speech bubbles to bring your characters to life.

Capture your story: Once your scene is set, capture and share your unique story.
detailed_description:
Urban Genesis is a Story-driven VR sandbox game, combining elements of the lego/sandbox genres. Build your world, big or small, then fill it with any of over thousands of objects. Add characters whose joints can be pushed, pulled and twisted into any pose imaginable, then customize your character however you desire. The only limit is your imagination!


Build your world: Create environments big or small, and fill them with over a thousand objects.

Add characters: Customize characters by pushing, pulling, and twisting their joints into any pose imaginable.

Give them a voice: Use custom speech bubbles to bring your characters to life.

Capture your story: Once your scene is set, capture and share your unique story.
name: Urban Genesis VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel i5, Ryzen or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1080, AMD Radeon 580 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • VR Support: Oculus 2, 3, pro
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 2060, AMD Radeon 5600xt or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • VR Support: Oculus 2, 3, pro

short_description: Build your own world: Design and fill it with buildings, roads, vehicles, and more. Bring it to life: Customize characters by changing their appearance, outfits, and accessories. Use posable characters to add dynamic scenes. Also you can play with friends and create awesome scenes!
